name: full
description: Full access

name: view
description: View and access the details of the resource.

name: create
description: Create new instances of the resource.

name: show
description: Display detailed information about a specific resource.

name: update
description: Modify existing instances of the resource.

name: destroy
description: Delete existing instances of the resource.

name: disable
description: Temporarily deactivate the resource.

name: enable
description: Reactivate a previously disabled resource.

name: export
description: Export data related to the resource in a specific format.

name: import
description: Import data into the system to create or update the resource.

name: archive
description: Move the resource to an archive state for long-term storage.

name: restore
description: Restore a previously archived or deleted resource.

name: share
description: Grant access to the resource to other users or groups.

name: history
description: View the historical actions or changes made to the resource.

name: revoke
description: Remove access or permissions previously granted to a user or group for the resource.

name: assign
description: Grant access or permissions to a user or group for a specific resource.

name: execute
description: Allows a user or group to run authorized commands within the system.

name: reset
description: Allows a user or group to restore settings or data to their default state.

name: basic
description: Provides access to essential features for individual users.

name: intermediate
description: Includes additional features and support for growing needs.

name: advanced
description: Unlocks all premium features with full access and support.
